name: Slow Start
summary: The user's Attack and Speed are halved for the first five turns the Pok√©mon is in battle.
viability: Slow Start is the only thing that holds Regigigas back from being a complete monster. Five turns is a significant amount of time, especially considering that most one-on-one battles only last a few turns. This forces Regigas to equip itself with status moves, which prevents him from being able to set up its Attacks.
